## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G13870](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G13870)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>EXGT-A4, XTH5</u>
- **Gene Name:** endoxyloglucan transferase A4, xyloglucan endotransglucosylase/hydrolase 5
- **Description:**   xyloglucan endotransglucosylase/hydrolase 5;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2159118
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
